title: Chairman PMYP congratulates Arshad Nadim for winning Olympics Gold Medal
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 9 (APP): Chairman of the Prime Minister’s Youth Programme (PMYP) Rana Mashhood Ahmed Khan, on Friday, extended warm congratulations to the Olympics Champion Arshad Nadim for winning the Gold Medal in the Javelin Throw competition at the Paris Olympics and setting a new Olympics record.
Expressing immense pleasure in his victory, he said that Nadim’s incredible talent, dedication, and hard work had earned the highest honour for the country.
“We’re proud of you for your outstanding achievement and you are an inspiration to countless young athletes. Your perseverance and passion are a reminder that dreams do come true”, he remarked.
The chairman emphasized the importance of sports in promoting unity, resilience, and national pride and reiterated the Government’s commitment to providing all necessary resources and support to empower and enhance Pakistan’s standing in the world of sports.
